Print This Page
Cambridge City
MA

Resolution
RES 2024 #184

Congratulations to Chrisine Doucet on her retirement from the Department of Human Services.

Information

Department:City Clerk's Office, PTSponsors:Councillor Paul F. Toner, Mayor E. Denise Simmons, Councillor Ayesha M. Wilson
Category:Congratulations

Attachments

Version History
  1. Printout

Body

Trytr617WHEREAS:

The City Council has learned that Christine Doucet retired on June 22, 2024, after 19 years of dedication to the City of Cambridge; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

Christine began her involvement with The Center for Families in 2002 initially as a parent, then as a volunteer, and then formally as the Infant Coordinator/ Family Support Specialist; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

Over the years, Christineâ€™s dedication has made a profound impact and lasting difference in the lives of countless families, providing crucial support, guidance, and connection to vital resources, her commitment has played a crucial role in improving the well-being and resilience of the community she serves; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

Noticing that men were missing from programming at the center and having a desire to change that, Cristine was instrumental in the creation of the Cambridge Dads Program which continues to thrive as it supports Cambridge dads and male caregivers providing a platform for them to connect, grow, and build community, and has helped to break down barriers and promote inclusivity; and

 

 

WHEREAS:

Christine's legacy at the Center for Families will not be forgotten, and her tireless efforts to create a supportive village of care and compassion will continue to inspire future generations of staff, volunteers, and community members; now therefore be it

 

 

RESOLVED:

That the City Council go on record thanking Christine Doucet for her unwavering dedication and commitment to the children and families of the City of Cambridge and wishing her good health and happiness in her much-deserved retirement; and be it further

 

 

RESOLVED:

That the City Clerk be and hereby is requested to forward a suitably engrossed copy of this resolution to Christine Doucet on behalf of the entire City Council.
